item.title: What You Need to Know About Medical Device Hacking
item.description: Medical devices are getting more connected every year. From pacemakers to blood sugar monitoring glucometers, these devices now have built-in Wi-Fi connectivity. That makes it easier for patients and medical professionals to monitor a patient’s well-being, but as with any networked system, it is also vulnerable to hacking. What do patients really need to know about medical device hacking? An Invisible Problem It can be difficult to tell whether hackers have attacked a device.
